content: And so that leads naturally to some lumpiness or variability in particular as we do larger and bigger deals and fuller buildings that creates quarterly or a sequential lumpiness and when those signed units turn into live units and which is why we don’t declare quarterly guidance around supply, but that’s obviously a factor that feeds into our revenue guidance and that revenue guidance for Q2 incredibly robust given the forward booking volumes that we see 140% year-on-year growth for Q2 and 100% to 110% year-on-year growth for 2022.
